parameters.ethnicity: factor indicating ethnicity: African-American, Caucasian, other.
parameters.health: factor. Is the self-reported health status “healthy”?.
parameters.education:
factor indicating highest degree attained:
no degree, GED (high school equivalent), high school, bachelor, master, PhD, other.
parameters.insurance: factor. Does the individual have a health insurance?

title: Medical Expenditure Panel Survey Data
description:
Description
Cross-section data originating from the Medical Expenditure Panel Survey survey conducted in 1996.
reference: This is a subset of the data used in Perry and Rosen (2004).
format: A data frame containing 8,802 observations on 11 variables.
